setup.name: auth_endpoint
setup.label: Zoho Auth Region
setup.message: Enter Zoho Auth Region https://accounts.zoho.in, https://accounts.zoho.com

setup.name: client_id
setup.label: OAuth2.0 Client ID
setup.placeholder: Enter Zoho Connect's OAuth2.0 Client ID

setup.name: client_secret
setup.label: OAuth2.0 Client Secret
setup.placeholder: Enter Zoho Connect's OAuth2.0 Client Secret

setup.name: selected_scopes
setup.label: Scopes
setup.message: Add comma seperated scopes for accessing Zoho Connect's api endpoints

scopeID.text: Network in which the event is to be posted

partitionId.text: The event can be posted in either the company wall or the group wall or the user's wall

title.text: Event title. Maximum characters allowed is 250

fields.text: Upload files using upload files API and then return the file IDs

allDay.text: Set this as true if you'd like the event to be an all-day one, and false if you don't

invitedMembers.text: User IDs of members to be invited to the event

invitedGroups.text: IDs of Groups to be invited to the event

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to create an event in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: Network in which the event is to be updated

invitedMembers.text: User IDs of members to be invited

invitedGroups.text: IDs of groups to be invited

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to add invitees to an event in Zoho Connect network

scopeID.text: Network in which the event is to be updated

streamId.text: Stream ID to add a reminder

intervalDay.text: Interval for even reminder in days {0,1,2,7}

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to add event attendees in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: Network in which the event is to be deleted

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to delete an event from Zoho Connect network

scopeID.text: ID of the network the events are in

selectedPartIds.text: Group IDs separated by a comma

startTime.text: Fetch data from the specified time

endTime.text: Fetch data till the specified time

sharedWithMe.text: Get only events that the user has been invited to

partitionType.text: If partitionId or selectedPartIds is not given, then this field has to be specified: (GROUP | DEFAULT)

partitionUrl.text: If partitionId or selectedPartIds is not given, then this field has to be specified

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to get the list of all upcoming events in a Zoho Connect network

scopeID.text: Network in which the event reminder is to be deleted

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to remove reminders from an event in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: Network in which the event is to be updated

invitedMembers.text: IDs of members to be removed as invitees

invitedGroups.text: IDs of groups to be removed as invitees

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to remove attendees from an event in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: Network in which the event to be updated is in

title.text: Event title. Maximum character limit is 250

desc.text: Event description. Maximum character limit is 1000

location.text: Event location. Maximum character limit is 250

fields.text: Upload files using upload Files API and then return the file IDs

startHour.text: Start time for the event in hours

startMin.text: Start time for the event in minutes

endHour.text: End time for the event in hours

allDay.text: Set this as true if you want the event as an all-day event and false if you don't

invitedMembers.text: Members to be invited to the event

invitedGroups.text: Groups to be invited to the event

deleteMemInvitees.text: Removed invitees. Multiple names should be separated by a comma

deleteGrpInvitees.text: Removed groups that are invited. Multiple groups should be separated by a comma

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to update an event in a Zoho Connect network

scopeID.text: Network in which the announcement is to be posted

partitionID.text: It can be either be the Group or Company wall

fileIds.text: Multiple file ids should be separated by a comma

meta.description: To purpose of this API is to create a new announcement in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: Network in which the poll is to be posted. You can get this from the network list API

partition.text: It can either be the Group/Company wall/User's partition id. By default, the user partition ID is taken

textOptions.text: Text options for the poll, separated by a comma

imageIds.text: Image Options for the Poll, separated by a comma

allowMultiple.text: Allow members to vote for multiple options. You can set this as either true or false

voteDisplayType.text: Either (0 | 1 | 2). 0 represents DEFAULT, 1 represents SHOW_AFTER_VOTE, 2 represents SHOW_AFTER_ADMIN_APPROVAL

canEditVote.text: Set this as true or false depending on whether you want members to edit their choice

canDeclareResult.text: Set this as true or false depending on whether you want the poll closed and the results declared

endDate.text: Days left for the poll to expire

endHour.text: Hour(s) for the poll to expire

endMin.text: Minutes for the poll to expire

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to create a poll in a Zoho Connect network

scopeID.text: Network in which the post was made

streamUrl.text: You can also fetch the post by URL

commentIndex.text: Start an index for comments. The default will be 0

commentLimit.text: Set a limit on the number of comments

isThread.text: Normal view or threaded view(the replies will be nested into comments json)

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to get  the details of a single post in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: Network in which the stream is to be posted

streamId.text: You can get the ID from the stream API

parentCommentId.text: For replies to a comment, the respective comment id has to be given

commentContent.text: The Maximum character limit allowed for a comment is 10000

fileIds.text: File IDs should be seperated by comma

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to add a comment to a post in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: ID of the Network the post has been made in

streamId.text: ID of the post to be deleted

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to delete a feed in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: ID of the network the posts have been made in

streamId.text: IDs of posts you want to fetch

partitionId.text: IDs of posts you want to fetch

commentLimit.text: Fetch comments based on a number limit

meta.description: To fetch streams based on streamId

scopeID.text: ID of the network in which the posts are made

streamLimit.text: Fetch feeds based on a limit

commentLimit.text: Fetch comments based on a limit

modifiedTime.text: Fetch posts made till a specified time

showUserDetails.text: You can show or hide user details

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to get posts from the My Feed page

scopeID.text: ID of the network the group belongs to

partitionId.text: ID of the Group you need to fetch the comments from

lastViewedTime.text: Fetch data after a specified time

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to get the latest comments from a group in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: Network id

lastViewedTime.text: Fetch data after the given time

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to get the latest group feeds in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: ID of the network the posts have been made in

partition.text: ID of the group the posts have been made in

lastViewedTime.text: Fetch data after a specified time

streamLimit.text: Set a limit for the posts

fetchTime.text: Fetch data till a specified time

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to get recent posts made in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: ID of the network the poll has been created in

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to get the results of a poll in Zoho Connect

streamId.text: ID of the stream to be updated

scopeID.text: Network in which the stream to be updated is in

linkImage.text: URL of the image to be shared

fileIds.text: Multiple file IDs should be separated by a comma

reorderFileIds.text: Reorder the file IDs and separate multiple IDs by a comma

isZohoDocsUrl.text: If video URL is a Zoho Docs file, set this as true

removedOptionIds.text: Reorder the poll option IDs and separate multiple IDs with a comma

imageIds.text: Image options for the poll should be separated by a comma

voteDisplayType.text: Add the members' ZU IDs separated by commas

canEditVote.text: Set this as True to enable editing of votes and False to disable edit

canDeclareResult.text: Set this as True to declare results and False if you don't want them declared.

allowMultiple.text: Set this as True if you'd like to allow members to vote for multiple options and False if you want to disable voting for multiple options

optionOrders.text: Order of the poll options, separated by a comma

endYear.text: Year for the poll to expirem

endMonth.text: Month for the poll to expire

endDate.text: Day for the poll to expire

endHour.text: Hour for the poll to expire

endMin.text: Minute for the poll to expire

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to update feed or poll preferences in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: ID of the network in which the post is to be made

categoryIDs.text: Add the IDs of categories that the Forum post belongs to

disableComments.text: Set this as true or false

isPublished.text: Set this as true or false

lastBlogCreatedTime.text: Fetch posts from the specified time

scopeID.text: ID of the network the post to be published is in

categoryIDs.text: Category IDs to add the forum to

disableComments.text: Set this as either true or false

blogId.text: The ID of the forum post you would like to update

scopeID.text: ID of the network the groups have been created in. You can get this from the Network list API

isRecentSort.text: Sort groups based on recency. Se this as true or false

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to get all groups in Zoho Connect network

scopeID.text: ID of the network the group needs to be created in

name.text: Provide a name for the group

userIds.text: Add the user IDs of members separated by a comma

isPrivate.text: Set this as true if you want your group to be private

isOpenMembership.text: Set this as true if you'd like members to find and join this group

createChannel.text: Set this as true if you'd like to create a channel for this group

isPrivate.text: Set this as true if you want your group to be private

isOpenMembership.text: Set this as true to allow anyone in your network to join this group

memberIds.text: User IDs separated by a comma. You can add up to 100 IDs

adminIds.text: Comma separated IDs of users to be added as admins. You can add up to 100 IDs

userEmailIds.text: Users' email addresses separated by a comma. You can add up to 100 addresses

role.text: Specify the role. You can choose between ADMIN, MEMBER, or MODERATOR

memberId.text: ID of member to be removed

boardId.text: Board ID to remove the member from

scopeID.text: Network in which the task is to be posted

boardId.text: In case the task needs to be added to a board, specify the board ID. If not, the task is added as a private task

title.text: Task title. Maximum characters allowed is 5000

desc.text: Task description. Maximum characters allowed is 500

sectionId.text: In case the task is added to a Board, provide the ID of the section to add the task to

priority.text: Set the priority levels as either: None or Low or Medium or High

streamId.text: In case you want to add a task that refers to a post, provide the stream ID of that post

position.text: Required in case of a board task

fileIds.text: Multiple file IDs should be separated by a comma

userIds.text: User IDs of members whom the task should be assigned to

eyear.text: Due date of the task. Mention the year

emonth.text: Due date of the task. Mention the month

edate.text: Due date of the task. Mention the date

isSelfReminder.text: If the task requires a reminder set this as true

checkList.text: Maximum of 10 checklist items is allowed

tagNames.text: Names of hashtags associated with the task

frequency.text: Set a value if you'd like to repeat the task

howOftenRepetition.text: Set a value based on how often you'd like the task to be repeated

dayOfWeek.text: Used when the task is repeated WEEKLY

dayOfMonth.text: Set a value if you'd like to repeat the task

meta.description: The purpose of this API is to create a task in Zoho Connect

scopeID.text: Network id. Can be taken from the network list API

boardId.text: ID of the board to add the section to

position.text: Position where the section needs to be inserted

sectionId.text: ID of the section to be deleted

sectionId.text: ID of the section to be updated

colourType.text: This is to update the color for the section

scopeID.text: Network in which the task to be updated is in

taskId.text: ID of the task. Can be taken from the response of add task json

title.text: Updated task title. Maximum characters allowed is 3000

priority.text: Update priority as either: None | Low | Medium | High

status.text: Update the task status by using these values: 0,1,2,3,4 {0-OPEN, 1-STARTED, 2-IN PROGRESS, 3-FOR REVIEW, 4-COMPLETED}

assigneeId.text: User IDs of the task assigness

removeAssigneeId.text: User IDs of assignees to be removed

isClearDueDate.text: You can clear the due date if needed

userId.text: The user's ZU ID or user ID
